app_descript:
App Name: Despicable Me: Minion Rush

Brief

Dive into the world of Minions with "Despicable Me: Minion Rush," a game that delivers endless fun with the iconic yellow characters. Help the Minions create delicious jelly by collecting exotic fruits, while participating in despicable antics across a multitude of missions. Rush through stunning, unexpected environments dodging obstacles, uncovering secrets, and amassing an enviable Minion wardrobe.
